title: David Novak, “Japanoise: Music at the Edge of Circulation” (Duke UP, 2013)
description:
Thinking about “Noise” in the history and practice of music means thinking in opposites. Noise is both a musical genre, and is not. It both produces a global circulation and emerges from it. It has depended on the live-ness of embodied performance while flourishing in the context of “dead” recordings....
